title: Lupin on Netflix | What to Watch
description:
Vox critic-at-large Emily VanDerWerff and film critic Alissa Wilkinson recommend Lupin, starring Omar Sy. It’s a five-episode French TV show based on a classic literary character who is a master of disguise and who delights in tricking criminals to bring justice. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
